arcs.headline: A massive expansion of Audio capabilities
arcs.summary: The audio suite exploded today with the addition of OVH Whisper for transcription, ElevenMusic for custom track generation, and an upgrade to ElevenLabs v3 for emotional speech. We also shipped the API plumbing to list and manage these models dynamically.

arcs.headline: A fresh look for the Dashboard and Play page
arcs.summary: We shipped a comprehensive frontend redesign featuring a persistent header, a restyled authorization flow, and a polished 'Play' interface that now natively supports the new audio generation tools.

arcs.headline: Meet Polly: The AI coding agent for Discord
arcs.summary: We open-sourced the full code for Polly, our Discord bot. It now features semantic code search and autonomous agents capable of executing tasks and answering technical questions directly in the community server.

arcs.headline: Tuning the engine: Cheaper search and better images
arcs.summary: Gemini Search costs dropped significantly with a model alignment fix. Meanwhile, we optimized Flux Klein for stability, improved Sana's visual quality, and fixed aspect ratio scaling for non-square generations.

one_liner: A symphonic release day bringing music generation, speech-to-text, a frontend redesign, and our new AI Discord agent.
